description: Biden’s infirmity was so painfully obvious in the June debate that observers failed to notice the weakness of Trump’s own rambling, nonsensical performance.
title: Trump could suffer the same fate as Biden in tonight’s debate — how will his party react?

description: A group of House Republicans will give an update on the status of Speaker Johnson’s (R-La.) proposed continuing resolution, which would provide six months of funding and include a measure requiring proof of citizenship to vote. description: SpaceX launched four private citizens into orbit early Tuesday morning for an ambitious flight that aims to venture farther into space than most astronauts have flown before — aside from the 24 Apollo astronauts who have been to the moon. The daring flight, called Polaris Dawn, also seeks to include the first-ever spacewalk conducted by…

description: A coalition of advocacy organizations sent a letter to Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) this week urging him to hold a vote on a proposal aimed at guarding against a future Trump administration from reviving a long-dormant law to effectively ban abortion. description: As long as both political parties use their own misinformation and disinformation campaigns, largely fact and truth-free, law enforcement is insufficient to limit foreign intrusions.
